short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The official Watch2Gether (W2G) extension - Watch videos together with your friends.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your Watch2Gether experience with our official browser extension. Enjoy quick access to your W2G rooms, see who's online, and easily share content from the site you're currently browsing. The extension also enables W2gSync, so you can sync content from sites that can't be played directly in a W2G room. Download now to make watching together even better!
